name: 「怪奇参道」（Kaiki Sando）
description: "Kaiki Sando" is a horror game set in the depths of Japan's mountains, exploring ancient secrets and mystical yokai. Players venture through the mountains, encountering supernatural phenomena. The game features two mysterious torii gates; choosing the right gate upon sensing a yokai influences the path taken, impacting the story's progression and outcome. The game, inspired by traditional Japanese yokai legends, requires players to interpret environmental clues for the correct choice. "Kaiki Sando" captivates with its immersive narrative, unique visual style, and gameplay where player decisions are crucial. It offers an unforgettable experience for those who love horror and puzzle-solving.
